Title: Contact Management
Description: a Personal Portfolio Website engineered with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. This project demonstrates advanced front-end expertise through seamless animations and Dark Mode functionality, coupled with robust back-end mastery. Key features include a secure RESTful API integration, full authentication systems featuring Registration and Login, utilizing JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for stateless session management, persistent data management via MySQL Database, and a dynamic project showcase module that proves proficiency in core CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations. This portfolio highlights the ability to deliver secure, high-performance, and aesthetically superior digital solutions.
Features: Full authentication systems featuring Registration and Login
Utilizing JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for stateless session management
Persistent data management via MySQL Database

Title: Sistem Informasi Desa
Description: Digital village website for managing development projects, activity reports, and community documentation with location map features.
Features: Development of the RKTL website for reporting on village development activities and progress
Annual progress analysis dashboard and project status percentage
Maps of all activities and projects using Maps
Search feature for projects and documentation

Title: Portal Berita
Description: A modern news portal featuring a complete homepage, categories, and article details. Includes user authentication with login and registration, role-based access for admins and users, trending and latest news display, and a search feature for quick content discovery.
Features: Complete news portal page (homepage, categories, news details)
Role-Based Access Control for admins and users
Displays the most popular and latest news

Title: Notes
Description: A simple note-taking app with a dark mode interface that allows users to create, search, and manage notes. Each note is displayed as a card with a title, content, and creation date, along with a real-time character limit for the title.
Features: Creating notes with titles and content
List of active notes displayed in cards

Title: Restaurant App
Description: This project was developed as a Capstone Project SIB Dicoding x MBKM 2024, in the form of a SPA and PWA based Restaurant application with a focus on accessibility, performance optimization (image & bundle), and thorough testing (integration & end-to-end) to ensure the quality and stability of the application.

Title: Movie Catalog
Description: Movie Catalog is a SPA and PWA-based web application that displays movie listings, with optimized performance, good accessibility, and guaranteed quality through Jest and manual testing (integration & end-to-end). This project was developed as a Capstone Project SIB Dicoding x MBKM 2024.
Features: Displays movie data, descriptions, ratings, and images

Title: Saborama Apps
Description: Saborama is a full-stack web application that displays a list of typical foods from all provinces in Indonesia. This application is built using Node.js and Express.js with a RESTful API architecture, and uses MySQL by Clever Cloud as the main database. All functionality is tested using Jest to ensure the quality, stability, and reliability of the application. This project was developed as a Capstone Project SIB Dicoding x MBKM 2024 with a focus on performance, a clean API structure, and efficient management of Indonesian culinary data.
Features: The Saborama app showcases typical foods from all provinces in Indonesia
Displays a list of dishes, images, descriptions, ratings, ingredients, time, and difficulty level

Title: 27 Trans Tiket Booking
Description: 27 Trans Ticket Booking is an online bus ticket reservation system designed to simplify the booking process for passengers. The platform provides an easy-to-use interface for browsing routes, schedules, and seat availability, allowing users to book tickets quickly and securely.
Features: User-friendly homepage for browsing available bus routes
Real-time seat availability and schedule display
Ticket booking and order confirmation system
Admin dashboard for managing routes, schedules, and bookings
Search feature for routes and departure times
